name: Close_Alert_HL
author: ATHEO
description: Send new status from a TheHive case/task to HarfangLab EDR

configurationItems.name: amp_cloud
configurationItems.description: FQDN of the AMP for Endpoints cloud to interact with

configurationItems.name: client_id
configurationItems.description: Client ID for AMP for Endpoints

configurationItems.name: api_key
configurationItems.description: API Key for AMP for Endpoints

configurationItems.name: unlock_code
configurationItems.description: Custom unlock code used to stop isolation from the endpoint (Maximum 24 characters)
